Document.name: CopyFrom
Document.typeparam: Type of values in the source container.
Document.param: Pointer to the first source value.
Pointer to the value after the last source value.
Set to true to perform appending instead of replacing.
Document.signature: template < typename Ds, typename S > void CopyFrom( Ds & ds, S const * begin, S const * end, bool append /* optional */ );
